dict.acceptation: 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；铁道部门；
乘火车旅行；在…铺设铁路；

sent.orig: Sanshui-Maoming Railway conjoins Beijing-Kowloon Railway, and Hechun-Maoming Railway connects Liuzhou-Zhanjiang Railway.
sent.trans: 三茂铁路与京广、广九线相接，河茂铁路与柳湛铁路相连。

sent.orig: Chinese railroad includes local railway line and national railway, joint-stock railroad, special railway.
sent.trans: 中国铁路包括国家铁路、合资铁路、地方铁路和专用铁路。

sent.orig: Litang-Zhanjiang Railway and Sanshui-Maoming Railway connect the national trunk railway lines to the whole country.
sent.trans: 铁路黎湛线、三茂线与国家铁路干线连通全国各地。

sent.orig: Railway construction, passenger cars, insurance, hotels, ports, railway transportation industry has been over possible revenue opportunities.
sent.trans: 铁路建设、乘用车、保险、酒店、港口、铁路运输等行业可能存在获得超额收益的机会。

sent.orig: Train traffic control is the center of railway high efficiency and security high speed railway.
sent.trans: 行车指挥系统是铁路列车高速、安全、正点运行的保证。
